data.eml:eml: Antonbruunia sociabilis sp. nov. (Annelida: Antonbruunidae) associated with the chemosynthetic deep-sea bivalve Thyasira scotiae Oliver & Drewery, 2014, and a re-examination of the systematic affinities of Antonbruunidae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Mackie, Andrew S. Y., Oliver, P. Graham, Nygren, Arne (2015): Antonbruunia sociabilis sp. nov. (Annelida: Antonbruunidae) associated with the chemosynthetic deep-sea bivalve Thyasira scotiae Oliver & Drewery, 2014, and a re-examination of the systematic affinities of Antonbruunidae. Zootaxa 3995 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3995.1.4
